column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Kai says : " We should go down there .
#Text=We might get in trouble .
#Text=" Kai says : " Come on ?
#Text=Let 's have some fun .
#Text=We 'll be back before anyone realizes we 're gone .
#Text=" Jinora says : " I guess it would be all right .
#Text=" Kai says : " Look !
#Text=Baby bisons .
#Text=How come they 're on the ground ?
#Text=" Jinora says : " Air bison calves ca n't fly after a week or two after they 're born .
#Text=So the entire herd will stay near the ground , near the valley .
#Text=" Kai says : " Let 's go see the babies .
#Text=" Jinora says : " Be careful .
#Text=The mothers are very protective .
#Text=" Kai says : " Aww , look how cute !
#Text=" Jinora says : " Kai , get out of there !
#Text=" Kai says : " Wow , you really saved me down there .
#Text=You know , you 're an incredible airbender .
#Text=" Jinora says : " Well , I 've been training for a long time .
#Text=" Kai says : " Then , why do n't you have tattoos like an airbending master ?
#Text=" Jinora says : " My dad says I 'm not a master yet .
#Text=" Kai says : " You can do everything your dad can .
#Text=Plus , you have all these spirit - y powers .
#Text=If anyone 's a master , you are .
#Text=" Bumi says : " And so , we bring the net down on the head pirate , and he looks around real sad and says , " I knew I should have followed my dreams and become a dentist . "
#Text=" Yung says : " How come you grow up to be so cool , while Tenzin became such a stick - in - the - mud ?
#Text=" Bumi says : " Well , I guess cool is something you 're born with .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " Bumi , can I talk to you ?
#Text=" Bumi says : " Let me guess , you want to criticize me for something ?
#Text=" Tenzin says : " Actually , I need your help .
#Text=" Bumi says : " Oh yeah .
#Text=With what ?
#Text=" Tenzin says : " I do n't think I 'm doing well with the new airbenders , and everyone knows you 're a natural leader .
#Text=" Bumi says : " True , I did win the Admiral Tung Natural Leadership Award , twice .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " What would you do if you were in charge ?
#Text=Help me be more like you .
#Text=" Bumi says : " I 'd love to .
#Text=You 've got to use military discipline to whip these troops into shape .
#Text=The only way to deal with new recruits is to break them down so you can build them back up .
#Text=Rule with an iron fist .
#Text=Show them who the master is .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " Thanks for the insight .
#Text=" Bumi says : " My pleasure .
#Text="
